[Next week is a [Go quiet week](https://groups.google.com/g/golang-dev/c/PwHJuavJcF8), so the next proposal review meeting will be in two weeks, October 6.]

**2021-09-22 / @rsc, @griesemer, @bradfitz, @andybons, @spf13**

**Accepted**

- **hash/maphash: Provide a \`purego\` implementation** [#47342](https://golang.org/issue/47342)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **maps: new package to provide generic map functions** [#47649](https://golang.org/issue/47649)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **net/http: make DNS lookup timeouts return net.DNSError instead of poll.TimeoutError** [#39178](https://golang.org/issue/39178)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **net: add Interface.InterfaceAddrs** [#42694](https://golang.org/issue/42694)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **path/filepath: add SkipAll** [#47209](https://golang.org/issue/47209)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **reflect: add Value.CanInt, CanUint, CanFloat** [#47658](https://golang.org/issue/47658)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **runtime/metrics: add GOMAXPROCS, NumCgoCall, GC CPU time** [#47216](https://golang.org/issue/47216)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **slices: add Sort, SortStable, IsSorted, BinarySearch, and func variants** [#47619](https://golang.org/issue/47619)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **spec: allow 'any' for 'interface{}' in non-constraint contexts** [#33232](https://golang.org/issue/33232)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **spec: generics: require type parameters on aliases** [#46477](https://golang.org/issue/46477)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **go/parser: add a mode flag to disallow the new syntax for type parameters / instantiation** [#47783](https://golang.org/issue/47783)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **log: add flag for displaying function name** [#47230](https://golang.org/issue/47230)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **fmt: add AppendPrint, AppendPrintf, AppendPrintln** [#47579](https://golang.org/issue/47579)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **net/netip: add new IP address package, use in net** [#46518](https://golang.org/issue/46518)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **bufio: add Reader.DiscardRunes(n int) and utf8: add RuneByteLen** [#47621](https://golang.org/issue/47621)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Active**

- **cmd/cgo: provide a safe way to pin Go Pointer for the period of a C function call** [#46787](https://golang.org/issue/46787)
  - discussion ongoing
- **cmd/go: add per-test timeouts** [#48157](https://golang.org/issue/48157)
  - commented
- **crypto: add facility for key erasure** [#21865](https://golang.org/issue/21865)
  - commented
- **go/doc: support explicit hotlinking syntax** [#45533](https://golang.org/issue/45533)
  - pending discussion #48305
- **go/types: additions to support type parameters** [#47916](https://golang.org/issue/47916)
  - discussion ongoing
- **reflect: add Value.FieldByIndexErr** [#48218](https://golang.org/issue/48218)
  - commented
- **reflect: rename MapIter.SetKey and MapIter.SetValue** [#48294](https://golang.org/issue/48294)
  - commented
- **runtime: enable address sanitizer in Go** [#44853](https://golang.org/issue/44853)
  - added to minutes
- **spec: allow eliding interface{  } in constraint literals** [#48424](https://golang.org/issue/48424)
  - added to minutes
- **spec: allow explicit conversion from function to 1-method interface** [#47487](https://golang.org/issue/47487)
  - discussion ongoing
- **sync, sync/atomic: add PoolOf, MapOf, ValueOf** [#47657](https://golang.org/issue/47657)
  - pending discussion #48287
- **syscall/js: remove Wrapper type to avoid extreme allocations and improve performance** [#44006](https://golang.org/issue/44006)
  - commented
- **x/crypto/ssh: export a transport interface** [#32958](https://golang.org/issue/32958)
  - discussion ongoing
- **x/crypto/ssh: expose supported Kex algorithms** [#46232](https://golang.org/issue/46232)
  - commented
